name: Satan, Take the Wheel!
description:
Frank, an incredibly buff janitor lives a perfectly normal life but disatster strikes and he perishes!

As Frank the buff janitor meets Jesus at the pearly gates, he is informed he is too much of a godly being to go to heaven and so Jesus sends him right to the pit of hell.

As frank lands in the realm of Satan, he informs Frank that if he wants revenge he can accend back up the 9 rings of hell and at the end of each, Satan will kill frank and make him accend closer to heaven. 

Once Frank has exited all 9 rings, he takes on Jesus at the pearly gates and destroy Jesus once and for all!

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Spacebar - Jump

Members of the Team Brocolee:

Lilith - Lead Programmer

Brandon Sparks - 2D Artist & Audio Creation

Will Allwood - Level Design

Harry Woods - 3D Artist 

Connor lyons - 3D Artist
